title: Renew Building's Hazard Insurance Policy
description: A property's hazard insurance policy is up for renewal. The PM needs to get quotes and renew the policy.

tasks.description: Retrieve the current insurance policy to review coverage and premium.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the details of the expiring policy.

tasks.description: Contact the insurance broker to request renewal quotes from multiple carriers.
tasks.expected_outcome: A request is sent to the broker to shop for competitive insurance quotes.

tasks.description: Review the quotes with the property owner and process the payment for the chosen policy.
tasks.expected_outcome: After owner approval, the premium for the new policy is paid and the new declaration page is saved.
